modName: Clean Imperial Bow and Steel Arrows
summary: New clean looking imperial bow and matching steel quiver.
descriptionHtml:
Hey everyone, 

This is my first submission so I\'ll be going right back into more modding in case I don\'t respond right away. 

I didn\'t like how the texture was on the awesome looking imperial bow so I though I could improve on it with the help of kevinwastaken version of the imperial bow. It has more of a natural wood look and I attempted to apply the hunting bow style tips on the ends. 

Comments and suggestions are appreciated. 

Thanks,
author: vixenfinder
